channel.title: What about you?
channel.description:
An educational program designed to illustrate the dangers of cigarette smoking for young people.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Should I smoke?
item.description: This program presents an anti-smoking message aimed at young people.
item.dc:creator: Flint Community Schools (Flint, Mich.)
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest
